entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
